name: Destab™ 9-4741S Calcium Carbonate 90S (Drums)
description:
Destab™ Calcium Carbonate 90SE - Ultra 250 is a white to off white free flowing, directly compressible powder,
manufactured to contain 90% Calcium Carbonate, USP/Ph. Eur. and 9% Pregelatinized Corn Starch, NF/Ph. Eur.. Destab™  Calcium Carbonate 90SE - Ultra 250 was designed for tablet and capsule formulations where optimum tableting and free flowing characteristics are desired. This product has a lead content not more than 250 ppb.
